sqlMap.update: UPDATE NATIONAL_HOLIDAY SET NATIONAL_DESCRIPTION=#holidayDescription# WHERE HOLIDAY_DATE=#holidayDate#
sqlMap.select: SELECT HOLIDAY_DATE AS holidayDate, NATIONAL_DESCRIPTION AS holidayDescription FROM NATIONAL_HOLIDAY WHERE HOLIDAY_DATE=#date#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT page.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT HOLIDAY_DATE AS holidayDate, NATIONAL_DESCRIPTION AS holidayDescription FROM NATIONAL_HOLIDAY
UPPER(NATIONAL_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
ORDER BY HOLIDAY_DATE ASC) page WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow#) WHERE rnum >= #startRow#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM NATIONAL_HOLIDAY
UPPER(NATIONAL_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
